pros: Avanti is a very employee centric organisation Seniors are very helpful Team works as a team rather than putting workload on any single team member.
cons: Not any as of now.

review_title: Best Organisation to work with and Grow your skills & Knowledge
job_title: Senior Program Manager in New York, NY
pros: - Clear Vision & Mission with five defined values - Work life Balance - Best Organisation to start career with - Very transparent Promotions system - Friendly work environment - Top Management is very friendly and open to discuss any issues. - Sat & Sunday weekly offs are really helpful to spend some quality time with loved once - Employees gets lot of stuff to explore and learn and grow their skills and knowledge - Management being always supportive and open for the employees to take additional responsibilities to impact on students career.
cons: - Should give good bonus and more incentives - Salaries are slightly less as it is an NGO

review_title: Doing every bit to educate underprivileged students.
job_title: Teacher Associate in San Diego, CA
pros: To teach underprivileged students gives u immense satisfaction that u r doing something for the betterment of these students, nurturing their future.
cons: Doing extra work apart from teaching which I personally don't like at all which requires extra time. To deliver a lecture, u have to go through lots of books, videos, techniques to teach in a very easy language and for this u need atleast 5-6 hours of home work per day. I don't know how someone prepares his class lecture in an hour or say two.

review_title: Amazing place for you to learn and grow exponentially
job_title: Senior Software Engineer in New York, NY
pros: - Lot of autonomy. You'll get to own your projects along with help from others. - Great leadership. You can schedule a call with them anytime to ask about anything. Even life advice. - Driven by intrinsic motivation. Almost everyone here is driven by cause and an intrinsic motivation to serve the kids, teachers and the schools. - Provides one of the most competitive salaries in the social impact space. - No unnecessary meetings! Most of the tech work happens asynchronously so no need to spend hours and hours in in-efficient meetings.
cons: - Sometimes the structure of your work might not be clear and that can put some people off.

job_title: Teacher Associate in Nūrpur, Himachal Pradesh
pros: Very good work environment Team members also good
cons: Noting Job security Not stable

cons: - Working with the government system is sometimes very challenging.

pros:
It's a perfect place for a fresher to start his career in Neet/Jee coaching.
Employees are getting proper training to increase their potential.
Working experience in Navodaya vidyalaya across the country.
Good opportunity to improve offline as well as online teaching skills.
cons:
Not getting enough leaves like other companies.
Work load is quite high during some months.
Work locations are far away from home.

pros: There are no pros in this company

5.You loose your privacy, and you are expected to adjust without proper amenities.

pros:
Changing lives of not only the underprivileged students of rural India but also their entire family.

I feel privileged to be part of this non profit organisation and humble enough to work for the years to come.
